name: Pinga Ponga (itch)
description:
I used Scratch to make the game, for the 3 hour Friday Night Game Jam 2020-36.

For the jam, you had to make a game with 1 button and 2 axis only. And I decided to make a 2 player ping pong game, with no buttons but 2 axis that can be controlled.

  • Use W & D keys for moving player 1
  • Use Arrow keys for moving player 2
